txt.en: Arvaethor can be found near a mountain pass encampment in the north-western part of Ringló Vale.\n\nYou should speak with Arvaethor.
'So there is another crevasse into the mountain atop of the old ruins. What ever is raising the Orkish forces and rallying the dead must be dwelling within.'
Defeated Ruthless Dead at Dâr Matum ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
With the Ruthless Dead and the Orcs working side by side, Arvaethor tasks you with causing disorder in the mountain pass encampment.
Defeat Ruthless Dead at Dâr Matum ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Can you feel the chill in the air? It is not a coldness but something much more evil.\n\n'This old mountain pass is crawling with the Dead and Orcs. I shall have your back and guard the base of the pass while you ascend the old ruins. I know not what we will find up there. Good luck my friend!'
Ruthless Dead and Orcs can be found in the mountain pass encampment in the north-western part of Ringló Vale.\n\nDefeat Ruthless Dead and Orcs in Dâr Matum.
